text:
<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. The sisters, Elizabeth and Mary, often confide in each other.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Elizabeth a :Person ;
    :name "Elizabeth" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Mary .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Elizabeth .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Elizabeth, Erin and Mary are sisters.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Elizabeth a :Person ;
    :name "Elizabeth" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Erin, :Mary .

:Erin a :Person ;
    :name "Erin" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Elizabeth, :Mary .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Elizabeth, :Erin .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. The sisters, Erin and Mary were born just a year apart, yet their personalities couldn't be more different.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Erin a :Person ;
    :name "Erin" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Mary .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Erin .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. The eldest sister, Erin, had a love of music, while her younger sister, Mary, preferred studying math.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Erin a :Person ;
    :name "Erin" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Mary .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Erin .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Erin was known for her outgoing nature and knack for leadership, while her younger sister,Mary, was the quieter one, preferring solitude and introspection.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Erin a :Person ;
    :name "Erin" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Mary .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Erin .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. If there was anything that could be said about the sisters, Elizabeth and Mary, was that their sibling bond was strong.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Elizabeth a :Person ;
    :name "Elizabeth" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Mary .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Elizabeth .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. While Mary and Erin sometimes had knock down fights, the sisters were each other's biggest defenders.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Erin .

:Erin a :Person ;
    :name "Erin" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Mary .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Erin and Mary both loved field hockey. And while they both excelled at competitive sports, the two sisters excelled more at competing against one another.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Erin a :Person ;
    :name "Erin" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Mary .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Erin .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. When they were younger, both Mary and Elizabeth shared all of their toys. But when Mary went off to college, she left her younger sister to what she considered were more childish pursuits.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Elizabeth .

:Elizabeth a :Person ;
    :name "Elizabeth" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Mary .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Both Mary and Elizabeth liked swimming, but only Elizabeth swam competitively. Mary preferred not to compete, especially if that meant competing against her little sister.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Elizabeth .

:Elizabeth a :Person ;
    :name "Elizabeth" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Mary .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Erin was the oldest of the Jordan girls, and Mary was the youngest.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Erin a :Person ;
    :name "Erin" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Mary .

:Mary a :Person ;
    :name "Mary" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :sister :Erin .</s>
